msg.msgText: The client request to publish a message to the server failed because the destination is not valid: ConnectionID={0} ClientID={1} Protocol={2} Endpoint={3} Reason={4}.

msgExplanation.p: A message could not be published because the topic name is not valid. The connection is terminated when this error occurs.

msgUserResponse.p: Refer to the MQTT specification for rules for valid topic names.
